shareMenu.shareDescription: This visualisation tool, created by Eurostat, displays electricity and natural gas prices in the EU and other European countries with a great level of detail. Users can interact with the data and customise the display in many different ways.

enprices.title: Electricity Prices
enprices.description: Visualise electricity and natural gas prices in the EU or your country.

ensankey.title: Sankey diagram - energy flows
ensankey.description: Visualise energy data through flow diagrams (Sankey diagrams) in the EU or your country.

enmonthly.title: Monthly energy data
enmonthly.description: Visualise seasonal energy trends in the EU or your country.

entrade.title: Energy trade
entrade.description: Visualise the trade flows in different ways in your country. Use it and customise your own map!

enbal.title: Energy balances
enbal.description: Visualise energy balances, see how much energy is imported or produced, find out sectors where the energy is consumed and check out different energy sources.

endash.title: Energy indicators
endash.description: Visualise a dashboard with energy statistics and indicators for your country or the EU.

shedthelight.imageAlt: Shedding light on energy in the EU
shedthelight.title: Interactive publication: Shedding light on energy in the EU
shedthelight.description: through easy texts, visualisations and videos.

EnergyScenarios.title: Energy scenarios
EnergyScenarios.description: Explore historical and future energy use with the JRC interactive tool. This tool is not from Eurostat, but from the Joint Research

welcome.title: Welcome to Energy Visualization
welcome.content: This tool helps you explore and understand energy prices across the EU.

cards.title: Visualization Tools
cards.content: Here you'll find different tools to explore energy data. Each card represents a different visualization option.

actions.title: Tool Actions
actions.content: You can customize the visualization settings or directly access the tool using these buttons.

share.title: Share Your Findings
share.content: Share interesting insights with others through various social media platforms.

language.title: Language Options
language.content: Change the interface language to your preferred option.

home.title: Eurostat Homepage
home.content: Return to the Eurostat main website at any time.
